## DomainStore.shred() method

Obfuscates all disclosed and encrypted PII that has been shredded.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
shred(this: void, options?: AbortOptions): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  this | void | <i>(Ignored)</i> This function uses implicit <code>this</code> binding |
|  options | [AbortOptions](./paramodel.abortoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Purge options |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise that resolves with a boolean value indicating whether the operation ran to completion.

When it resolves to `false` the operation should be run again until it eventually completes.
